short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Stack Exchange users voting behavior.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stack Exchanges sites:   (stackoverflow, serverfault, ...)

Opening a question will have an indicator added by each user details that gives

- number of upvotes
- an arrow picturing the ratio upvotes / downvotes
- number of downvotes

Version history:

1.0.2  June  16, 2020  make the extension work for the Stack Exchange 'election' page as well
1.0.1  June  10, 2020  Removed all requested permissions as they were not used
1.0.0  March 22, 2019  Production
